fields.name: Introduction to Environmental Conservation
fields.description: This course provides an overview of environmental conservation principles and practices. Learn about the importance of preserving natural habitats and ecosystems.

fields.name: Marine Conservation and Oceanography
fields.description: Explore the world of marine conservation and the science of oceanography. This course covers the threats to marine environments and the strategies used to protect them.

fields.name: Sustainable Agriculture and Land Management
fields.description: Learn how sustainable agricultural practices can help conserve soil, water, and biodiversity. This course also covers land management strategies to combat deforestation.

fields.name: Wildlife Conservation and Ecology
fields.description: This course delves into wildlife conservation, covering species protection, habitat conservation, and ecological balance. Ideal for those interested in protecting wildlife.

fields.name: Environmental Policy and Advocacy
fields.description: Understand the role of policy in environmental conservation. This course covers environmental law, policy-making processes, and how to advocate for sustainable practices.
